title: 12 RP FOR LUCIAN OR RITO
body:
http://imgur.com/LOXaznH




My masterpiece leme get kiting noobs with my bae rito!

replies.body: An interesting art, where does the arrow lead?  Hit us up with this in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) or [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RiotSupport).  Maybe we can work something out!
hey thanks and the arrow is his dash lol I'm kiting a mundo and he's screamin adc op nerf pls lol and I sent a support ticket a bit ago thanks!
